title: Hubbell Trading Post National Historic Site: Do Business With Us
body: Do Business With Us       Special Use Permits A special use permit is required for activities that provide a benefit to an individual, group, or organization rather than the public at large. These activities require some degree of management from the National Park Service if there is the potential for interference with visitor use, congestion of a highly visited area, or possible impact on park resources. Film/Photography Permit Application Special Use Permit Application
